description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Half-Vice President, Half Killer Space Robot, CheneyStar threatens mankind.  It is up to you to stop him in this arcade classic remake featuring hybrid 2D/3D game.  Can you survive his devastating attacks and relentless insults?
